§ 12221. Grant authorization(a) In generalThe Attorney General may make grants to State, Indian tribal, or local prosecutors for the purpose of supporting the creation or expansion of community-based justice programs.
(b) ConsultationThe Attorney General may consult with the Ounce of Prevention Council in making grants under subsection (a).
(Pub. L. 103–322, title III, § 31701, Sept. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 1890.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 13861 of Title 42, The Public Health and Welfare, prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
